TriggerOraclev10g.name: BK_COMM_MASTER_DETAIL
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
DECLARE
dmltype CHAR;
BEGIN
IF DBMS_REPUTIL.FROM_REMOTE = FALSE THEN
IF INSERTING THEN dmltype := 'I';
INSERT INTO "OSD"."BK_COMM_MASTER_DETAIL"
(PROCESS_NO,YEAR,DEPARTMENT_NO,RECIEVED_TO_CODE,
IN_OUT_NUM,IN_DEPT_CLASS,IN_ARCHIVE_NO,IN_DATE_DD,
IN_DATE_MM,IN_DATE_YY,IN_OUT_TYPE,ACTION_CODE,EMPLOYEE_NO,
SERIAL_NO,USER_ID,INTERY_TIME,IN_ACCOMPANIED,CREATE_DATE,TEMP_DATE_ORDER,
TIME,SITE,P_TYPE,P_DATE ) VALUES
(:NEW.PROCESS_NO, :NEW.YEAR, :NEW.DEPARTMENT_NO,:NEW.RECIEVED_TO_CODE,
:NEW.IN_OUT_NUM, :NEW.IN_DEPT_CLASS,:NEW.IN_ARCHIVE_NO,:NEW.IN_DATE_DD,
:NEW.IN_DATE_MM, :NEW.IN_DATE_YY, :NEW.IN_OUT_TYPE, :NEW.ACTION_CODE,
:NEW.EMPLOYEE_NO,:NEW.SERIAL_NO, :NEW.USER_ID, :NEW.INTERY_TIME,
:NEW.IN_ACCOMPANIED ,:NEW.CREATE_DATE, :NEW.TEMP_DATE_ORDER, :NEW.TIME,:NEW.SITE,'I',SYSDATE);
ELSIF UPDATING THEN dmltype := 'U';
INSERT INTO "OSD"."BK_COMM_MASTER_DETAIL"
(PROCESS_NO,YEAR,DEPARTMENT_NO,RECIEVED_TO_CODE,
IN_OUT_NUM,IN_DEPT_CLASS,IN_ARCHIVE_NO,IN_DATE_DD,
IN_DATE_MM,IN_DATE_YY,IN_OUT_TYPE,ACTION_CODE,EMPLOYEE_NO,
SERIAL_NO,USER_ID,INTERY_TIME,IN_ACCOMPANIED,CREATE_DATE,TEMP_DATE_ORDER,
TIME,SITE,P_TYPE,P_DATE ) VALUES
(:NEW.PROCESS_NO, :NEW.YEAR, :NEW.DEPARTMENT_NO,:NEW.RECIEVED_TO_CODE,
:NEW.IN_OUT_NUM, :NEW.IN_DEPT_CLASS,:NEW.IN_ARCHIVE_NO,:NEW.IN_DATE_DD,
:NEW.IN_DATE_MM, :NEW.IN_DATE_YY, :NEW.IN_OUT_TYPE, :NEW.ACTION_CODE,
:NEW.EMPLOYEE_NO,:NEW.SERIAL_NO, :NEW.USER_ID, :NEW.INTERY_TIME,
:NEW.IN_ACCOMPANIED ,:NEW.CREATE_DATE, :NEW.TEMP_DATE_ORDER, :NEW.TIME,:NEW.SITE,'U',SYSDATE);

ELSIF DELETING THEN dmltype := 'D';
INSERT INTO "OSD"."BK_COMM_MASTER_DETAIL"
(PROCESS_NO,YEAR,DEPARTMENT_NO,RECIEVED_TO_CODE,
IN_OUT_NUM,IN_DEPT_CLASS,IN_ARCHIVE_NO,IN_DATE_DD,
IN_DATE_MM,IN_DATE_YY,IN_OUT_TYPE,ACTION_CODE,EMPLOYEE_NO,
SERIAL_NO,USER_ID,INTERY_TIME,IN_ACCOMPANIED,CREATE_DATE,TEMP_DATE_ORDER,
TIME,SITE,P_TYPE,P_DATE ) VALUES
(:NEW.PROCESS_NO, :NEW.YEAR, :NEW.DEPARTMENT_NO,:NEW.RECIEVED_TO_CODE,
:NEW.IN_OUT_NUM, :NEW.IN_DEPT_CLASS,:NEW.IN_ARCHIVE_NO,:NEW.IN_DATE_DD,
:NEW.IN_DATE_MM, :NEW.IN_DATE_YY, :NEW.IN_OUT_TYPE, :NEW.ACTION_CODE,
:NEW.EMPLOYEE_NO,:NEW.SERIAL_NO, :NEW.USER_ID, :NEW.INTERY_TIME,
:NEW.IN_ACCOMPANIED ,:NEW.CREATE_DATE, :NEW.TEMP_DATE_ORDER, :NEW.TIME,:NEW.SITE,'D',SYSDATE);
END IF;
END IF;
END;
